name: Hellslime in Wonderland
description:
You've had enough with those happy-go-lucky residents of wonderland, and it’s time to take revenge. Use your weapons and spells to cleave your way through and get a high score. 

  • WASD or Arrow Keys for movement
  • number keys 1-3 for weapon select (sword-ax-katana respectively)
  • left-click to attack, 
  • right-click to fireball
  • shift to move faster

CREDITS:

Jack Campbell: Modeling and Texturing

Peter Hawkins: Cover Art and Modeling

JP Bailly-Hall: Enemy Behavior Programmer

Bobby Hicks: Build Controller and General Programmer
